it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model.excommunications

Class Excommunication

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model.excommunications.Excommunication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssetsExcommunication, EndGameAssetsExcommunication, EndGameCardsExcommunication, MarketExcommunication, RoundExcommunication, ServantsExcommunication, StrengthsExcommunication

    public abstract class Excommunication
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class that represents an excommunication. It has always an age, an id and an array that contains the excommunicated players
    See Also:
